channel.title: Dialogue Options
channel.description:
I started using Emulous as a base source, and ripped Project Insanity's dialogue system. My problem is that I dont know how to make options start a new dialogue.
ex.
NPC: Hi, can I help you with something? Player: Opt1: Yes, I need to find Mc Donalds. -> NPC: Its around the corner on Main Street. -> Player: Thanks! -> End Opt2: No, I am just talking to you cause I'm bored. -> NPC: Cool Story Bro! -> End
I hope I explained that well enough. Thanks!
edit: ffs no help...

item.title: Dialogue Options
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

I started using Emulous as a base source, and ripped Project Insanity’s dialogue system. My problem is that I dont know how to make options start a new dialogue.

ex.

NPC: Hi, can I help you with something?
Player:
Opt1: Yes, I need to find Mc Donalds. -> NPC: Its around the corner on Main Street. -> Player: Thanks! -> End
Opt2: No, I am just talking to you cause I’m bored. -> NPC: Cool Story Bro! -> End

I hope I explained that well enough.
Thanks!

edit: ffs no help…
